name: GemCrush WIP
description:
Welcome, Welcome, Welcome!

This is the BEST game you can find! Just sit down, grab your mouse, swing it around, crash into gems and collect point!

Mouse is all you will need, so you can use your other hand to eat some chips;)

The goal is to get as high score as possible. You do that by crashing into the colorful GEMS with your gray square. By collecting you also build up your multiplayer. Higher multiplayer = higher score.
You have only 60 seconds so hurry up. If you have any multiplayer left after the times run out you can keep playing if you keep the multiplayer up!

Be careful, there is a purple triangle that doesn't like you. You will have to dodge it when it charges on you. If you get hit you will get stunned and also loose a gem that could appear.

Good luck!


Used Resources:
  • Music: Patrick de Arteaga
  • Background: wallpapercave.com
  • Shatter Sound: Wine Glass Shattering A1 Sound Effect
  • Hit Sound: Floor Tom Drum Hit Level 7B Sound Effect
  • Leader board: Silen Wolf
